name: Louise's Peanut Butter Kisses
author: Louise Maria Blankenship

ingredients.name: c. granulated sugar, for rolling cookies

instructions: Combine peanut butter, shortening and sugar. Stir in milk, vanilla, and eggs. Add dry ingredients. Mix thoroughly, using your hands if necessary. Shape dough into 1 inch balls, roll in 1/3 cup granu- lated sugar. Place on ungreased baking sheets. Bake at 350Â° for 10 minutes. Remove from oven and press a chocolate kiss on the center of each cookie. Remove to rack to cool. Make 6 to 7 dozen cookies.
